name: botbuilder-lg
author: Microsoft Corp.
description: Bot Builder Language Generation is a library to help build sophisticated bot responses with multiple phrases and context-based expressions.

scripts.antlr-build: antlr4ts src/LGFileLexer.g4 -o src/generated && antlr4ts src/LGFileParser.g4 -visitor -o src/generated && antlr4ts src/LGTemplateLexer.g4 -o src/generated && antlr4ts src/LGTemplateParser.g4 -visitor -o src/generated
scripts.build-docs: typedoc --theme markdown --entryPoint botbuilder-lg --excludePrivate --includeDeclarations --ignoreCompilerErrors --module amd --out ..\..\doc\botbuilder-lg .\lib\index.d.ts --hideGenerator --name "Bot Builder SDK - LG" --readme none
